subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Mike Moustakas hit a home run in the fourth inning and had a perfect sacrifice bunt in the ninth as the Royals took a commanding 2-0 lead in the American League Championship Series.
snippet: Mike Moustakas hit a home run in the fourth inning and had a perfect sacrifice bunt in the ninth as the Royals took a commanding 2-0 lead in the American League Championship Series.
